## Text Like A Pirate
Simple PHP script using [Nexmo][1] and ye [ARRPI][2] to provide an SMS [Talk Like A Pirate][3] translation service for all them landlubbers.

## Setup
Copy yonder script to a web host that supports PHP, and add ye Nexmo credentials to that 
there script or use those shiny environment variables.
